lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Tuesday accused Judge Andrew S. Hanen of overstepping his authority by imposing sanctions on government lawyers for what he said were ethics violations.

headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Criticizes Immigration Case Judge
headline.main: Justice Dept. Says Judge in Immigration Case Is Out of Bounds

snippet: The Obama administration on Tuesday accused Judge Andrew S. Hanen of overstepping his authority by imposing sanctions on government lawyers for what he said were ethics violations.
abstract: Justice Dept, in court filing, accuses Judge Andrew S Hanen of Federal District Court in Brownsviille, Tex, of overstepping his authority by accusing government lawyers in 26 states, all involved in Obama administration's deportation protection efforts, of ethics violations; filing escalates ongoing feud with Hanen over legal challenge to president's executive actions on immigration.
